name: Injunctions and civil penalty
text:
Any person who violates any provision of this chapter, or any rules, regulations, criterion, procedure, or certificate issued hereunder may, in a legal action commenced by the board:



	(1)	Be enjoined from continuing such violation; and
	(2)	Be subject to a civil penalty of not less than $100 a day and not greater than $200 a day for each day of continuing violation. [L 1978, c 169, pt of §2]
